sect1.title: Installation
sect1.para:
The easiest way to install PHP\Manipulator is via its pear-channel pear.robo47.net or directly from a PEAR-package you can download on the pear-channels page: pear.robo47.net.
Since PHP\Manipulator depends on Symfony2, which not yet has an official PEAR-repository, I added a Pear-Package for it too, until there is an official Symfony2-PEAR-Package in the Symfony-PEAR-Repository.
